name: Surprise Dungeon
description:
Credits : sOlaris38, gnousrick, Valsept
Build : Gamemaker Studio 2

Controls : use WASD or the arrow keys to move and J to attack
Goal : SURPRISE :DDD
For the most part of the bugs or the overall clunkiness it's more about a lack of time on our first ever GameJam but feel free to try it and give us feedbacks, maybe we'll fix the problems in the future :D
